sample.description: This is just a sample experiment. It will not be included since active is false

variant.description: Show a recommendation in the third highlights spot

weightedHighlights.description: Use weighted highlights instead of the query based ones.

dedupedCombinedFrecency.description: Add frecencies of deduped top sites for ranking

locallyFetchMetadata.description: Make a network request for content of a URL

originalNewTabSites.description: Use the sites from the original about:newtab

locallyFetchMetadata20.description: Make a network request for content of a URL

newTabPrefs.description: Enable the New Tab Prefs feature

screenshotsAsync.name: High Res Icons and Screenshots for Top Sites
screenshotsAsync.description: Add high res icons or screenshots for some Top Sites

bookmarkScreenshots.name: Screenshots for Highlights
bookmarkScreenshots.description: Show a screenshot for Highlights that otherwise don't have an image

screenshotsLongCache.name: High Res Icons and Screenshots for Top Sites with a long metadata cache
screenshotsLongCache.description: Add high res icons or screenshots for some Top Sites

metadataLongCache.name: Metadata with Long Cache
metadataLongCache.description: Change the timeout for metadata to a long time

editTopSites.description: Enable the Edit Top Sites feature

pocket.name: Trending stories provided by Pocket
pocket.description: Display recommendations of trending stories by Pocket

metadataNoService.name: Metadata with No Remote Service
metadataNoService.description: Disable all calls to the metadata service

control.description: We still make calls to the metadata service

variant.description: Make no calls to the metadata service

metadataLocalRefresh.name: Metadata with local parsing and periodic refresh
metadataLocalRefresh.description: Process metadata locally and periodically refresh it

control.description: Metadata is processed locally at browse time only

variant.description: Metadata is processed locally at browse time and periodically in a background task
